title: Welsh oggie
ingredients: ['Shortcrust pastry', '450g plain flour', '1 pinch salt', '250g chilled butter, diced', '6 tablespoons chilled water', 'beaten egg or milk, to glaze', 'Filling', '25g butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '200g leeks, finely sliced', 'salt and pepper to season', '350g lean lamb, finely diced', '200g potato, peeled and finely diced', '50ml lamb or vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon mint sauce']
